data.title: Contribution Upvotes
data.solution:
t = input().split()
s = input().split()
a = input()

u = 0

if len(t) >= 2 and not any([len(w) <= 3 for w in t]):
    u += 1

if s[0][0].isupper() and len(s) >= 10:
    u += 1

if not "BOT" in a:
    u += 1

c = [x.lower() for x in t + s]

if "upvote" in c or "upvotes" in c:
    u = -1

print(u)
data.statement:
You feel sorry for the people who have to create a contribution to progress on the quest map, so you have created three bots that upvote contributions.

However, you want to make sure that they at least have done something to earn it. So you came up with the following criteria, <<each criterion met earns the contribution an upvote>>:
- Title [[T]] must be at least {{2}} words, each having more than {{3}} characters
- Statement [[S]] must be at least {{10}} words and the <<first word must start with a capital letter>>
- Author [[A]] must <<not>> contain the text {{BOT}} (case-sensitive)

Since you do not want to reward those who beg for upvotes, you decide to make it so that any mention of {{upvote}} or {{upvotes}} (case-insensitive) in the contribution, will give a single downvote and no upvotes. (So the output becomes {{-1}})

data.stubGenerator:
read t:string(256)
read s:string(256)
read a:string(256)
write upvotes
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> [[T]] is the title of the contribution.
<<Line 2:>> [[S]] is the statement of the contribution.
<<Line 3:>> [[A]] is the author of the contribution.
data.outputDescription: The relative change on the upvote count after all the bots have voted.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You feel sorry for the people who have to create a contribution to progress on the quest map, so you have created three bots that upvote contributions.

However, you want to make sure that they at least have done something to earn it. So you came up with the following criteria, each criterion met earns the contribution an upvote:
- Title T must be at least 2 words, each having more than 3 characters
- Statement S must be at least 10 words and the first word must start with a capital letter
- Author A must not contain the text BOT (case-sensitive)

Since you do not want to reward those who beg for upvotes, you decide to make it so that any mention of upvote or upvotes (case-insensitive) in the contribution, will give a single downvote and no upvotes. (So the output becomes -1)
Input
Line 1: T is the title of the contribution.
Line 2: S is the statement of the contribution.
Line 3: A is the author of the contribution.
Output
The relative change on the upvote count after all the bots have voted.
Constraints
1 ≤ length(T) ≤ 32
1 ≤ length(S) ≤ 256
1 ≤ length(A) ≤ 32
Example
Input
First
You have to count cats if there is more than three
johntheone21
Output
2
